name: Bulbasaur
description: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this Pokémon.

name: Ivysaur
description: When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the ability to stand on its hind legs.

name: Venusaur
description: The plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.

name: Charmander
description: The flame on its tail shows the strength of its life force. If it is weak, the flame also burns weakly.

name: Charmeleon
description: It has a barbaric nature. In battle, it whips its fiery tail around and slashes away with sharp claws.

name: Charizard
description: Spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. Known to cause forest fires unintentionally.

name: Squirtle
description: After birth, its back swells and hardens into a shell. It powerfully sprays foam from its mouth.

name: Wartortle
description: Often hides in water to stalk unwary prey. For swimming fast, it moves its ears to maintain balance.

name: Blastoise
description: A brutal Pokémon with pressurized water jets on its shell. They are used for high-speed tackles.

name: Caterpie
description: Its short feet are tipped with suction pads that enable it to tirelessly climb slopes and walls.

name: Metapod
description: This Pokémon is vulnerable to attack while its shell is soft, exposing its weak and tender body.

name: Butterfree
description: In battle, it flaps its wings at great speed to release highly toxic dust into the air.

name: Weedle
description: Often found in forests and grasslands. It has a sharp, toxic barb of around two inches on top of its head.

name: Kakuna
description: Almost incapable of moving, this Pokémon can only harden its shell to protect itself from predators.

name: Beedrill
description: It has three poisonous stingers on its forelegs and its tail. They are used to jab its enemy repeatedly.

name: Pidgey
description: A common sight in forests and woods. It flaps its wings at ground level to kick up blinding sand.

name: Pidgeotto
description: This Pokémon is full of vitality. It constantly flies around its large territory in search of prey.

name: Pidgeot
description: When hunting, it skims the surface of the water at high speed to pick off unwary prey such as Magikarp.

name: Rattata
description: Bites anything when it attacks. Small and very quick, it is a common sight in many places.

name: Raticate
description: Its hind feet are webbed. They act as flippers, so it can swim in rivers and hunt for prey.

name: Spearow
description: Inept at flying high. However, it can fly around very fast to protect its territory.

name: Fearow
description: With its huge and magnificent wings, it can keep aloft without ever having to land for rest.

name: Ekans
description: Moves silently and stealthily. Eats the eggs of birds, such as Pidgey and Spearow, whole.

name: Arbok
description: The frightening patterns on its belly have been studied. Six variations have been confirmed.

name: Pikachu
description: It raises its tail to check its surroundings. The tail is sometimes struck by lightning in this pose.

name: Raichu
description: When electricity builds up inside its body, it becomes feisty. It also glows in the dark.

name: Sandshrew
description: Burrows deep underground in arid locations far from water. It only emerges to hunt for food.

name: Sandslash
description: Curls up into a spiny ball when threatened. It can roll while curled up to attack or escape.

name: Nidoran♀
description: Although small, its venomous barbs render this Pokémon dangerous. The female has smaller horns.

name: Nidorina
description: The horn on its head has atrophied. It's thought that this happens so Nidorina's children won't get poked by it.

name: Nidoqueen
description: Its body is encased in extremely hard scales. It will protect its young at the expense of its own life.

name: Nidoran♂
description: Stiffens its ears to sense danger. The larger its horns, the more powerful its secreted venom.

name: Nidorino
description: An aggressive Pokémon that is quick to attack. The horn on its head secretes a powerful venom.

name: Nidoking
description: It is recognized by its rock-hard hide and its extended horn. Be careful with the horn, as it contains venom.

name: Clefairy
description: Its magical and cute appeal has many admirers. It is rare and found only in certain areas.

name: Clefable
description: A timid fairy Pokémon that is rarely seen. It will run and hide the moment it senses people.

name: Vulpix
description: While young, it has six gorgeous tails. When it grows, several new tails are sprouted.

name: Ninetales
description: It has nine long tails and fur that gleams gold. It is said to live for 1,000 years.

name: Jigglypuff
description: Uses its alluring eyes to enrapture its foe. It then sings a pleasing melody that lulls the foe to sleep.

name: Wigglytuff
description: The body is soft and rubbery. When angered, it will suck in air and inflate itself to an enormous size.

name: Zubat
description: Forms colonies in perpetually dark places. Uses ultrasonic waves to identify and approach targets.

name: Golbat
description: Once it strikes, it will not stop draining energy from the victim even if it gets too heavy to fly.

name: Oddish
description: During the day, it stays in the cold underground to avoid the sun. It grows by bathing in moonlight.

name: Gloom
description: Smells incredibly foul. However, around one out of a thousand people enjoy sniffing its nose-bending stink.

name: Vileplume
description: The larger its petals, the more toxic pollen it contains. Its big head is heavy and hard to hold up.

name: Paras
description: Burrows to suck tree roots. The mushrooms on its back grow by drawing nutrients from the bug host.

name: Parasect
description: A host-parasite pair in which the parasite mushroom has taken over the host bug. Prefers damp places.

name: Venonat
description: Lives in the shadows of tall trees where it eats bugs. It is attracted by light at night.

name: Venomoth
description: The powdery scales on its wings are hard to remove from skin. They also contain poison that leaks out on contact.

name: Diglett
description: Lives about one yard underground where it feeds on plant roots. It sometimes appears above ground.

name: Dugtrio
description: A team of Diglett triplets. It triggers huge earthquakes by burrowing 60 miles underground.

name: Meowth
description: Adores circular objects. Wanders the streets on a nightly basis to look for dropped loose change.

name: Persian
description: Although its fur has many admirers, it is tough to raise as a pet because of its fickle meanness.

name: Psyduck
description: Always tormented by headaches. It uses psychic powers, but it is not known if it intends to do so.

name: Golduck
description: Swims dynamically, as if it were performing a dance. The reason is simple—it is a result of using the enhanced muscles it developed by swimming through the sea.

name: Mankey
description: Extremely quick to anger. It could be docile one moment then thrashing away the next instant.

name: Primeape
description: Always furious and tenacious to boot. It will not abandon chasing its quarry until it catches up.

name: Growlithe
description: Very friendly and faithful to people. It will try to repel enemies by barking and biting.

name: Arcanine
description: A Pokémon that has been admired since the past for its beauty. It runs agilely as if on wings.

name: Poliwag
description: Its newly grown legs prevent it from running. It appears to prefer swimming than trying to stand.

name: Poliwhirl
description: Capable of living in or out of water. When out of water, it sweats to keep its body slimy.

name: Poliwrath
description: An adept swimmer at both the front crawl and breaststroke. Easily overtakes the best human swimmers.

name: Abra
description: Using its ability to read minds, it will identify impending danger and teleport to safety.

name: Kadabra
description: It is rumored that a boy with psychic abilities suddenly transformed into Kadabra while he was assisting research into extrasensory powers.

name: Alakazam
description: Its brain cells multiply continually until it dies. As a result, it remembers everything.

name: Machop
description: Loves to build its muscles. It trains in all styles of martial arts to become even stronger.

name: Machoke
description: Its muscular body is so powerful, it must wear a power-save belt to be able to regulate its motions.

name: Machamp
description: Using its heavy muscles, it throws powerful punches that can send the victim clear over the horizon.

name: Bellsprout
description: A carnivorous Pokémon that traps and eats bugs. It uses its root feet to soak up needed moisture.

name: Weepinbell
description: It spits out poisonpowder to immobilize the enemy and then finishes it with a spray of acid.

name: Victreebel
description: Lures prey with the sweet aroma of honey. Swallowed whole, the prey is melted in a day, bones and all.

name: Tentacool
description: Drifts in shallow seas. Anglers who hook them by accident are often punished by its stinging acid.

name: Tentacruel
description: The tentacles are normally kept short. On hunts, they are extended to ensnare and immobilize prey.

name: Geodude
description: Found in fields and mountains. Mistaking them for boulders, people often step or trip on them.

name: Graveler
description: Rolls down slopes to move. It rolls over any obstacle without slowing or changing its direction.

name: Golem
description: Its boulder-like body is extremely hard. It can easily withstand dynamite blasts without taking damage.

name: Ponyta
description: Its hooves are 10 times harder than diamonds. It can trample anything completely flat in little time.

name: Rapidash
description: Very competitive, this Pokémon will chase anything that moves fast in the hopes of racing it.

name: Slowpoke
description: Incredibly slow and sluggish. It is quite content to loll about without worrying about the time.

name: Slowbro
description: Lives lazily by the sea. If the Shelter it wears on its tail is broken, it grows slow and lethargic.

name: Magnemite
description: Uses anti-gravity to stay suspended. Appears without warning and uses Thunder Wave and similar moves.

name: Magneton
description: Generates strange radio signals. It raises the temperature by 3.6 degrees Fahrenheit within 3,300 feet.

name: Farfetch'd
description: The stalk it holds is its weapon. The stalk is used like a sword to cut all sorts of things.

name: Doduo
description: A two-headed Pokémon that was discovered as a sudden mutation. It runs at a pace of over 60 miles per hour.

name: Dodrio
description: Its three heads think independently. However, they are friendly and never appear to squabble.

name: Seel
description: The protruding horn on its head is very hard. It is used for bashing through thick ice.

name: Dewgong
description: Stores thermal energy in its body. Swims at a steady 8 knots even in intensely cold waters.

name: Grimer
description: Appears in filthy areas. Thrives by sucking up polluted sludge that is pumped out of factories.

name: Muk
description: Smells so awful, it can cause fainting. Through degeneration of its nose, it lost its sense of smell.

name: Shellder
description: Clamps down on its prey with its shell and injects poison. Then it peels the prey before eating.

name: Cloyster
description: For protection, it uses its harder-than-diamonds shell. It also shoots spikes from the shell.

name: Gastly
description: Almost invisible, this gaseous Pokémon cloaks the target and puts it to sleep without notice.

name: Haunter
description: Because of its ability to slip through block walls, it is said to be from another dimension.

name: Gengar
description: Under a full moon, this Pokémon likes to mimic the shadows of people and laugh at their fright.

name: Onix
description: Burrows at high speed in search of food. Its large jaw has incredible strength.

name: Drowzee
description: If you sleep by it all the time, it will sometimes show you dreams it has eaten in the past.

name: Hypno
description: Always holding a pendulum that it swings at a steady rhythm, it causes drowsiness in anyone nearby.

name: Krabby
description: It can be found near the sea. The large pincers grow back if they are torn out of their sockets.

name: Kingler
description: The larger pincer has 10,000-horsepower strength. However, it is so heavy, it is difficult to aim.

name: Voltorb
description: Usually found in power plants. Easily mistaken for a Poké Ball, they have zapped many people.

name: Electrode
description: Stores electrical energy inside its body. Even the slightest shock could trigger a huge explosion.

name: Exeggcute
description: During a protracted battle, the sprout grows into a tree. To avoid detection by its enemies, it hides motionlessly in tall grass.

name: Exeggutor
description: Legend has it that on rare occasions, one of its heads will drop off and continue on as an Exeggcute.

name: Cubone
description: Wears the skull of its deceased mother. Its cries echo inside the skull and come out as a sad melody.

name: Marowak
description: The bone it holds is its key weapon. It throws the bone skillfully like a boomerang to KO targets.

name: Hitmonlee
description: When kicking, the sole of its foot turns as hard as a diamond on impact and destroys its enemy.

name: Hitmonchan
description: While apparently doing nothing, it fires punches in lightning-fast volleys that are impossible to see.

name: Lickitung
description: Its tongue has well-developed nerves that run to the very tip, so it can be deftly manipulated.

name: Koffing
description: Because it stores several kinds of toxic gases in its body, it is prone to exploding without warning.

name: Weezing
description: It mixes gases between its two bodies. It's said that these Pokémon were seen all over the Galar region back in the day.

name: Rhyhorn
description: Its massive bones are 1000 times harder than human bones. It can easily knock a trailer flying.

name: Rhydon
description: Protected by an armor-like hide, it is capable of living in molten lava of 3,600 degrees.

name: Chansey
description: It is said to deliver happiness. Being compassionate, it shares its eggs with injured people.

name: Tangela
description: The whole body is swathed with wide vines that are similar to seaweed. Its vines shake as it walks.

name: Kangaskhan
description: The infant rarely ventures out of its mother's protective pouch until it is 3 years old.

name: Horsea
description: Known to shoot down flying bugs with precision blasts of ink from the surface of the water.

name: Seadra
description: Touching the back fin causes numbness. It hooks its tail to coral to stay in place while sleeping.

name: Goldeen
description: Its tail fin billows like an elegant ballroom dress, giving it the nickname of the Water Queen.

name: Seaking
description: In the autumn spawning season, they can be seen swimming powerfully up rivers and creeks.

name: Staryu
description: An enigmatic Pokémon that can effortlessly regenerate any appendage it loses in battle.

name: Starmie
description: Its central core glows with the seven colors of the rainbow. Some people value the core as a gem.

name: Mr. Mime
description: If interrupted while it is miming, it will slap around the offender with its broad hands.

name: Scyther
description: With ninja-like agility and speed, it can create the illusion that there is more than one.

name: Jynx
description: It seductively wiggles its hips as it walks. It can cause people to dance in unison with it.

name: Electabuzz
description: Normally found near power plants, they can wander away and cause major blackouts in cities.

name: Magmar
description: Its body is made of magma. If it doesn't keep moving, its body will cool and harden.

name: Pinsir
description: If it fails to crush the victim in its pincers, it will swing it around and toss it hard.

name: Tauros
description: When it targets an enemy, it charges furiously while whipping its body with its long tails.

name: Magikarp
description: An underpowered, pathetic Pokémon. It may jump high on rare occasions, but usually not more than seven feet.

name: Gyarados
description: Rarely seen in the wild. Huge and vicious, it is capable of destroying entire cities in a rage.

name: Lapras
description: A gentle soul that can read the minds of people. It can ferry people across the sea on its back.

name: Ditto
description: Capable of copying an enemy's genetic code to instantly transform itself into a duplicate of the enemy.

name: Eevee
description: Its genetic code is irregular. It may mutate if it is exposed to radiation from element Stones.

name: Vaporeon
description: Lives close to water. Its long tail is ridged with a fin which is often mistaken for a mermaid's.

name: Jolteon
description: It accumulates negative ions in the atmosphere to blast out 10,000-volt lightning bolts.

name: Flareon
description: When storing thermal energy in its body, its temperature could soar to over 1600 degrees.

name: Porygon
description: A Pokémon that consists entirely of programming code. Capable of moving freely in cyberspace.

name: Omanyte
description: Although long extinct, in rare cases, it can be genetically resurrected from fossils.

name: Omastar
description: A prehistoric Pokémon that died out when its heavy shell made it impossible to catch prey.

name: Kabuto
description: A Pokémon that was resurrected from a fossil using modern science. It swam in ancient seas.

name: Kabutops
description: Its sleek shape is perfect for swimming. It slashes prey with its claws and drains their fluids.

name: Aerodactyl
description: A Pokémon that roamed the skies in the dinosaur era. Its teeth are like saw blades.

name: Snorlax
description: Very lazy. Just eats and sleeps. As its rotund bulk builds, it becomes steadily more slothful.

name: Articuno
description: A legendary bird that is said to appear to doomed people who are lost in icy mountains.

name: Zapdos
description: A legendary bird that is said to appear from clouds while dropping enormous lightning bolts.

name: Moltres
description: Known as the legendary bird of fire. Every flap of its wings creates a dazzling flash of flames.

name: Dratini
description: A Pokémon that is said to live in raging seas and lakes. It can evolve into Dragonair if it survives.

name: Dragonair
description: A mystical Pokémon that exudes a gentle aura. Has the ability to change climate conditions.

name: Dragonite
description: It is said that this Pokémon constantly flies over the immense seas and rescues drowning people.

name: Mewtwo
description: It was created by a scientist after years of horrific gene splicing and DNA engineering experiments.

name: Mew
description: So rare that it is still said to be a mirage by many experts. Only a few people have seen it worldwide.
